code: import React from'react';import{useMsal}from'@azure/msal-react';import{loginRequest}from'../authConfig';import'./LoginButton.css';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const LoginButton=()=>{const{instance,accounts}=useMsal();const handleLogin=()=>{instance.loginPopup(loginRequest).catch(e=>{console.error(e);});};const handleLogout=()=>{instance.logoutPopup().catch(e=>{console.error(e);});};if(accounts.length>0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"auth-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"user-info",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["\uD83D\uDC4B Hello, ",accounts[0].name||accounts[0].username]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogout,className:"auth-button logout-button",children:"\uD83D\uDEAA Sign Out"})]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"auth-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogin,className:"auth-button login-button",children:"\uD83D\uDD10 Sign in with Microsoft"})});};
